column2: probably the best filet mignon I have ever had. We began the meal with oysters followed by the bone marrow starter. Highly recommend the bone marrow as it comes with a great house made sour dough bread. Between the dry aged rib eye and the filet mignon
column3: thought the filet was superior. Would also recommend the charred broccoli side as it is the lightest accompaniment for the steak. The other sides are on the richer/saltier side.
